item.title: Cloud Recovery Mirrors Your Servers and Data
item.description:
Protecting valuable assets is crucial for any business, which is why backups are essential. However, backups alone can’t protect against major disasters that could damage physical infrastructure. Having a backup located in the company safe won’t help if a catastrophic event destroys the entire building. Since many businesses heavily rely on computer systems, replicating the entire IT infrastructure is a wise decision. You might be wondering about the cost of duplicating server rooms, applications, and data...
